name: Joel Smallbone
description:
'''Joel David Smallbone''' (born 5 June 1984) is an Australian singer and actor. He is a member of the [[contemporary Christian music|Christian pop]] duo [[For King & Country (band)|For King & Country]] along with his brother Luke Smallbone. 

Aside from his music career, Smallbone played James Stevens in the 2016 film ''[[Priceless (2016 film)|Priceless]]'' and [[Antipater (son of Herod the Great)|Antipater]] in the 2023 film ''[[Journey to Bethlehem]]''. He directed the 2024 American Christian drama film ''[[Unsung Hero (film)|Unsung Hero]]'', and played the role of his father David Smallbone.{{Unreliable source?|date=February 2025|reason=}}
